[File: aptos-core/config/src/config/api_config.rs] [Lines: 71-77] [Worker starvation] If max_runtime_workers is set to 1 on a high-traffic validator, can API request queuing cause consensus messages to be delayed, leading to missed block proposals and validator penalties? (High)
